title: Reaper
description: *NEWLY REVISED 2020 EDITION*Could there be life, if there was no Death?When a devious plot begins to unfold, the Reaper is caught in the wake of Hell’s wrath. Azazel, one of the oldest demons to roam Hell, seeks an advantage when he finally escapes. His sights are set on what gives the Grim Reaper its powers, the Scythe of Death. With no other options, Death is thrown into the ongoing war between Heaven and Hell.After helping souls cross over for the span of humanity’s existence, Death is finally granted life. The human emotions of love, hate, vengeance, and sorrow are all experienced by the Reaper on its inquisitive walk through life. Along the way, it obtains help from heroic humans, the immortal protectors of earth, fallen angels and more. Should Death fail in its quest, Lucifer’s plan to overtake Earth and gain an upper hand in the war will be achieved.
author: Seth Gruner
